glg2d

Class GLGraphics2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Graphics
      • java.awt.Graphics2D
        • glg2d.GLGraphics2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GLShaderGraphics2D

    public class GLGraphics2D
extends Graphics2D
implements Cloneable
    Implements the standard Graphics2D functionality, but instead draws to an OpenGL canvas.

      • setColorRespectComposite

        protected void setColorRespectComposite(Color c)
        Sets the current color with a call to glColor4*. But it respects the AlphaComposite if any. If the AlphaComposite wants to pre-multiply an alpha, pre-multiply it.

      • setColor
